title: Finance Officer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Educate! (Kampala) in Apr 2023
Interview Descriptions: We were interviewed using both written and oral interviews for this role. Time apportioned to the written interview was sufficient. One needed to prepare for both and allocate time well in order to complete.
Interview Questions: About the accounting process, debit, credit, and tax applications.

title: Finance Officer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Educate! (Kigali, Kigali) in Aug 2022
Interview Descriptions: A practical test followed by on screen interviews. 2 interviews in total. One face to face interview. the interviews lasted 30 minutes each for the video interviews and one hour for the face to face interview.
Interview Questions: Why Educate? Why do you want to work for educate?

title: Trainer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Educate! (Nairobi) in Feb 2022
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was well described by the HR department but for some reason when the interview date was communicated they didn't remember ,we had to postpone.  It felt like lack of commitment
Interview Questions: Why do you want to join Educate!

title: Trainer Interview
Interview Descriptions:
It was exciting and a learning process.  20minutes initial discussion. Then other interviews later on.  The interview was Virtual but interesting. It was engaging and relevant to the position. The interviewer practised professionalism and respect. 
It was well organized and stated on time and ended on time.

title: Administrator Interview
Interview Descriptions: Email was the only method of contact.  The company expects free work in the guise of interview.  I do not recommend due to what I experienced when applying for this job.
Interview Questions: Expected to do lengthy project within specified time limit.

title: Recruiter Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Educate! (Quito) in Nov 2019
Interview Descriptions:
They initiate the process with questionaires like the "Intelligence Questionaire" that is not for Intelligence but for Ethic and lawless behaviour 
In the same process they suggest the candidates to PAY for find a job at the same time than they are working for companies that are paying for recruit these candidates.

title: Fellowship Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Educate!
Interview Descriptions: Multiple interviews, pretty intense process but I liked it because I felt the organization takes seriously who they hire because they want to invest in staff. Everyone was nice and communicated well throughout and I got a good feel for the organization during the process.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work at Educate!?

title: Evaluation Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Educate!
Interview Descriptions: The hiring process was good despite not going beyond the first stage - practical challenge. The hiring personnel were quick to give updates on the hiring process and were considerate. They are also willing to give a feedback on reasons why one's candidacy was not selected.
Interview Questions: Please read the paper and write a 1-2 page summary, highlighting the general findings, as well as any specific details that you think would be important for a program designer at Educate! to know.

title: Design Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Educate! (Nairobi) in Oct 2017
Interview Descriptions: Most rigorous ever. They give you support all along the way and very meaningful feedback. You feel the human touch with the first encounter. At the end of the process, you are very clear as to what you are expected to deliver on.
Interview Questions: If you would do the task again, how differently would you do it? (there was a  task to develop a curriculum)

title: Innovation Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Educate! (Nairobi) in Mar 2017
Interview Descriptions: Applied and forgot about it. They got back 2 months later, with an initial 20 minute phone interview , which I passed. This was followed by a series of written exercises, which I again passed.  I was then invited for an in-person interview, in which we went through my thought process for the written tests and how I arrived at the answers. We then discussed my fit for the role, etc.

title: Director of Development Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 7 weeks. I interviewed at Educate! in Sept 2012
Interview Descriptions: Educate!'s hiring process was exceptionally prolonged and multi-tiered. They responded to my initial application at the beginning of September, and concluded the process by the end of October. The hiring process included four phone interviews, submission of several writing samples, two timed writing tests, and a final in-person interview. All references were checked, and the company took additional time to seek references from contacts not provided by the prospective employee.
